DOC.brief_summary: This descriptive study cohort patient ankylose spondylitis use etoricoxib population . It also include nested case-control analysis ( great equal 700 event give type available analysis ) estimate odds current exposure etoricoxib , various anti-inflammatory treatment , compare non-exposure treatment , clinical outcome interest European patient Ankylosing Spondylitis . The study population follow-up time refresh / add annually , analysis re-run annually cumulative basis 2017 .
DOC.brief_title: Post-authorization Safety Study Etoricoxib Other Anti-inflammatory Therapies European Patients With Ankylosing Spondylitis ( MK-0663-163 )
DOC.criteria: A recorded Ankylosing Spondylitis diagnosis database A record AS diagnosis follow applicable `` acceptable data quality '' date database contain patient 's record At least 6 month register medical record database applicable `` acceptable data quality '' date describe , prior record AS diagnosis Complete information gender birth year
